name: Spirit Unleashed
description:
What is Spirit Unleashed

In a world full of demons and darkness, where everyones hope is lost, you are the only one who can kill all the demons and bring peace into the world.

Playstyle:

In this combat based Platformer, you have to kill every demon in your way. Collect souls of former humans to gain your ultimate power. Spikes out of steel and wood can block your way as well as giant canyons. 

Controlls:

A/D (Left Stick) to Move

Space (South Button) to Jump

Shift (Shoulder Button) to Dash

E (West Button) to Attack

R (East Button) for your Special Attack 

Q (North Button) for second Jump

Development:

Azimozi
